paper_abstract: An essential problem in the design of holographic algorithms is to decide whether the required signatures can be realized under a suitable basis transformation (SRP). For holographic algorithms with matchgates on domain size 2, [1,2,4,5] have built a systematical theory. In this paper, we reduce SRP on domain size k >= 3 to SRP on domain size 2 for holographic algorithms with matchgates on bases of rank 2. Furthermore, we generalize the collapse theorem of [3] to domain size k >= 3. (C) 2014 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Holographic algorithms on bases of rank 2
